contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German Location |Art = Stadt |Name = Friedland |Wappen = Wappen Friedland.PNG |lat_deg = 53 |lat_min = 39 | lat_sec= |lon_deg = 13 |lon_min = 32 | lon_sec= |Lageplan = Friedland in MBS.svg |Bundesland = Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania |Landkreis = Mecklenburgische Seenplatte |Amt = Friedland |Höhe = 25 |Fläche = 97.64 |Einwohner = 7251 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 17098 |Vorwahl = 039601 |Kfz = MST |Gemeindeschlüssel = 13 0 71 035 |Adresse = Riemanstraße 42<br />17098 Friedland |Website = [http://www.friedland-mecklenburg.de/ www.friedland-mecklenburg.de] |Bürgermeister = Wilfried Block }} '''Friedland''' is a [[town]] in the district [[Mecklenburgische Seenplatte (district)|Mecklenburgische Seenplatte]], [[Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania]], [[Germany]]. It is a local center for some villages like [[Kotelow]], [[Luebbersdorf]], [[Schwichtenberg]], [[Dahle]] and [[Boldekow]], and has approximately 8500 citizens. It was founded in 1244 by the [[Prince-elector|Prince-electors]] Otto and Johann of Brandenburg, then having the name ''Vredeland''. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *http://www.friedland-mecklenburg.de - Official website {{Towns and municipalities in Mecklenburgische Seenplatte (district)}} [[Category:Towns in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern]] {{MecklenburgischeSeenplatte-geo-stub}}
